title: Hi, I am Yixuan Yang
text:
Startup Entrepreneur | 3D Artist | Project Manager | Multimedia Specialist | Data Analyst






About Me




I am a former owner of a business that hosted in-person Murder Mystery Games, an animator who worked on the game Yolked at Hard Boiled Studio, and a current MS student in Global Marketing Management at Boston University.
I have a BS degree in Animation from Drexel University, and I have a passion for creating engaging and immersive experiences for different audiences, using a variety of skills and tools, such as Marketing Technology, 3D creation tools, and post-processing.
I am motivated by the challenge and opportunity to create innovative and captivating products and projects that can reach and delight a global audience. I believe I can bring diverse perspectives and experiences to the team, as well as a strong work ethic and a creative mindset.
